krpano.action: mul(stagescale, 2.0);

style.name: videointerface_menuitem_selected
style.css: text-align:left; color:#FFFFFF; font-family:Arial; font-weight:bold; font-size:12px; text-decoration:underline;

events.name: videointerface_flat_events
events.onmousedown: set(videointerface_mousedown, true); copy(mx,mouse.x); copy(my,mouse.y); asyncloop(videointerface_mousedown, sub(dx,mouse.x,mx); sub(dy,mouse.y,my); copy(mx,mouse.x); copy(my,mouse.y); add(plugin[get(videointerface_video)].ox,dx); add(plugin[get(videointerface_video)].oy,dy); );

krpano.action: if(videointerface_shown, videointerface_hide_interface(), videointerface_show_interface() );
videointerface_selectmenuitem(%1, %2, false);
videointerface_enablemenuitem(%1, %2, false);
set(layer[videointerface_%1_menu].state, 'opened'); tween(layer[videointerface_%1_menu].y, get(layer[videointerface_%1_window].height));
set(layer[videointerface_%1_menu].state, 'closed'); tween(layer[videointerface_%1_menu].y, -10);
plugin[get(videointerface_video)].togglepause();
